full_summary:
### RCMP Long Range Aircraft Request for Information (RFI)

#### Reference
WS4633747277-Doc4643437918

#### Solicitation Number
WS4633747277

#### Publication Date
June 19, 2024

#### Tender Closing Date
July 9, 2024, 2:00 PM EST

#### Amendment Date
June 19, 2024

#### Expected Contract Start Date
November 29, 2024

#### Expected Contract End Date
November 29, 2029

#### Procurement Details
* Category: Goods and Services (GD)
* Method: Competitive, open bidding
* Criteria: Combination of technical merit and price

#### Geographic Scope
* Region of opportunity: None
* Region of delivery: Ottawa, ON

#### Trade Agreements
This opportunity is open to bidders who have entered into Free Trade Agreements with the Government of Canada, including the Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA).

#### Contracting Entity
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) serves as the contracting entity, with the Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) as the end-user.

#### Contact Information
For inquiries, please contact:

* Melanie Martyn, Trade Policy and Negotiations Branch, PSPC
* Email: [melanie.martyn@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:melanie.martyn@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
* Website: [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/20066986?extsite=MjAwNjY5ODZfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/20066986?extsite=MjAwNjY5ODZfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)

#### RFI Purpose
This Request for Information (RFI) is intended to gather industry feedback on the draft Request for Proposal (RFP) for the procurement of long-range aircraft for the Royal Canadian Mounted Police. We invite interested parties to provide comments and suggestions on the proposed procurement strategy and document requirements.

Note: Your rewritten output should contain the same relevant information as the original, but in a more polished and professional formatting. You may simplify some sections to fit the 400-word limit. Your output should be in Markdown.  You can add a title or heading to your output to make it clear that it
